title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added endpoints for pinning and unpinning issue comments across multiple GitHub Apps and REST API configuration files.
Introduced `has_pull_requests` field in repository schemas to indicate PR enablement status.
Defined `Pinned Issue Comment` schema with `pinned_at` and `pinned_by` fields.
Updated SHA references in configuration files.
summary:
- Added endpoints for pinning and unpinning issue comments across multiple GitHub Apps and REST API configuration files.
- Introduced `has_pull_requests` field in repository schemas to indicate PR enablement status.
- Defined `Pinned Issue Comment` schema with `pinned_at` and `pinned_by` fields.
- Updated SHA references in configuration files.
generated_title: Add pin/unpin issue comment endpoints and repository schema updates
original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added endpoints for pinning and unpinning issue comments across multiple GitHub Apps and REST API configuration files.
- Introduced `has_pull_requests` field in repository schemas to indicate PR enablement status.
- Defined `Pinned Issue Comment` schema with `pinned_at` and `pinned_by` fields.
- Updated SHA references in configuration files.

### Title  
Add pin/unpin issue comment endpoints and repository schema updates
